biospec_descr.textblock: Blood samples collected from Peripheral Venous Blood； Tissues collected from the operation

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this observational study is to investigate the preoperative and operative
      factor of pain and functional outcome at one years following total knee arthroplasty and
      spinal surgeon.

clinical_study.brief_title: Predicting the Outcome of Total Knee Arthroplasty and Spinal Surgeon

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. The patients have been waiting for surgery for treatment of osteoarthritis or disc
             degeneration disease.

          2. Must be between 18 and 65 years of age, of either sex.

          3. Must demonstrate willingness to participate in the study by signing the written
             informed consent.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. Patients with Mandatory spondylitis, infections, neoplasms, inflammation,
             deformities, or previous surgery of spine or knee.

          2. The patient is participating in an interventional clinical trial or has in an
             interventional clinical trial within 30 days prior to enrollment.

study_pop.textblock: Inpatients; Patients have been diagnosed with osteoarthritis or disc degeneration disease.

clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Study of Risk Factors and Outcomes Following Total Knee Arthroplasty and Spinal Surgeon

oversight_info.authority: China: Beijing Municipal Science and Technology Commission

primary_outcome.measure: Change of functional score over time in the patients after operation

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of quality of life score over time in the patients after operation

collaborator.agency: No.1 Hospital affiliated to General Hospital of the Chinese People's Liberation Army

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
